# triangleCount

**Instance Property**

The number of triangles described by the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneGeometry/triangleIndices-1azi3] buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var triangleCount: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

Each set of three indices forms a triangle, so the number of indices in the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneGeometry/triangleIndices-1azi3] buffer is three times the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARPlaneGeometry/triangleCount] value.

## Accessing Mesh Data

- **vertices**: An array of vertex positions for each point in the plane mesh.
- **textureCoordinates**: An array of texture coordinate values for each point in the plane mesh.
- **triangleIndices**: An array of indices describing the triangle mesh formed by the plane geometry’s vertex data.
